publicationStmt.publisher: To the Reader: The English Preface in Print, c. 1475-1640 / Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership

monogr.title: A sacred septenarie, or The seuen last wordes of our Sauiour Christ vttered vpon the crosse, (with the necessary circumstances of the same:) : expounded by a commentary, gathered out of the holy Scriptures, the writings of the ancient fathers, and later diuines. By Alexander Roberts, Bachelour in Diuinity; and preacher of Gods word at Kings Linne, in Norfolke
monogr.author: Roberts, Alexander

div.head: To the Reader.
div.p: THe faults and ouersight of the Presse, be more then I wished, fewer then I feared; for there was a carefull eye ouerseeing, and a heedfull regard had, for the auoyding of all errors: but it is not incident to humane diligence, to preuent euery escape. Therefore amend these, which are here signified, being as I hope of the greatest moment. If there be any more, pardon them, whether in letters misplaced, or mistaken.

div.head: Faults in the context.
div.p: PAg. 2. lin. 13. for more, reade then, p. 15. l. 24. adde (is) before but once vsed, p. 51. l. 34. for g • rge purge, pag. 53. lin. 13. for them him, pag. 56. lin. 18. for practise practique, pag. 62. lin. 12. for Zomen Z • zemen, pag. 74. lin 29. for his her, pag. 84. lin. 12. after comfortable hope, adde Of, pag. 102. l. 11. for but a few, reade not a fewe, pag. 112. lin. 25. for cause case, pag. 110. lin. 35. for then when.

div.head: Faults escaped in the margent.
div.p:
Pag. 5. for migrent migret, pag. 9. for 〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 , pag. 10. for rep: rerum, and for
〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 , p. 13 for lib. 8. 3. pag. 25. for hu •• synodi, huiusmodi, pag. 28. adde Senarclaeus indignam Iohannis Diasij, &c. pap. 73. for 〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 .
